verses.verse: Let not your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> be troubled: <S%G5015><s%> you believe <S%G4100><s%> in God, <S%G2316><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in me.

In my Father's <S%G3962><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> are many <S%G4183><s%> mansions: <S%G3438><s%> if <S%G1490><s%> it were not so, I would have told <S%G2036><s%> you. I go <S%G4198><s%> to prepare <S%G2090><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> for you.

And if <S%G1437><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> and prepare <S%G2090><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> for you, I will come <S%G2064><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and receive <S%G3880><s%> you to myself; <S%G1683><s%> that where <S%G3699><s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> there you may be also. <S%G2532><s%>
And where <S%G3699><s%> I go <S%G5217><s%> you know, <S%G1492><s%> and the way <S%G3598><s%> you know. <S%G1492><s%>

Thomas <S%G2381><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> not where <S%G4226><s%> you go; <S%G5217><s%> and how <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> we know the way? <S%G3598><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, I am <S%G1510><s%> the way, <S%G3598><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> and the life: <S%G2222><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to the Father, <S%G3962><s%> but by me.

If <S%G1487><s%> you had known <S%G1097><s%> me, you should have known <S%G1097><s%> my Father <S%G3962><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%> and from now on <S%G737><s%> you know <S%G1097><s%> him, and have seen <S%G3708><s%> him.
Philip <S%G5376><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> us the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and it suffises <S%G714><s%> us.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Have I been <S%G1510><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> long <S%G5118><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> with you, and yet have you not known <S%G1097><s%> me, Philip? <S%G5376><s%> he that has seen <S%G3708><s%> me has seen <S%G3708><s%> the Father; <S%G3962><s%> and how <S%G4459><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> you then, Show <S%G1166><s%> us the Father? <S%G3962><s%>

Believe <S%G4100><s%> you not that I am in the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and the Father <S%G3962><s%> in me? the words <S%G4487><s%> that I speak <S%G2980><s%> to you I speak <S%G2980><s%> not of myself: <S%G1683><s%> but the Father <S%G3962><s%> that dwells <S%G3306><s%> in me, he does <S%G4160><s%> the works. <S%G2041><s%>

Believe <S%G4100><s%> me that I am in the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and the Father <S%G3962><s%> in me: or <S%G1161><s%> else <S%G1490><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> me for the very works' <S%G2041><s%> sake.

Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, He that believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me, the works <S%G2041><s%> that I do <S%G4160><s%> shall he do <S%G4160><s%> also; <S%G2548><s%> and greater <S%G3187><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> than these <S%G5130><s%> shall he do; <S%G4160><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> to my Father. <S%G3962><s%>

And whatever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> you shall ask <S%G154><s%> in my name, <S%G3686><s%> that will I do, <S%G4160><s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> may be glorified <S%G1392><s%> in the Son. <S%G5207><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> you shall ask <S%G154><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing in my name, <S%G3686><s%> I will do <S%G4160><s%> it.
If <S%G1437><s%> you love <S%G25><s%> me, keep <S%G5083><s%> my commandments. <S%G1785><s%>

And I will pray <S%G2065><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and he shall give <S%G1325><s%> you another <S%G243><s%> Comforter, <S%G3875><s%> that he may abide <S%G3306><s%> with you for ever; <S%G165><s%>

Even the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of truth; <S%G225><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> receive, <S%G2983><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> it sees <S%G2334><s%> him not, neither <S%G3761><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> him: but you know <S%G1492><s%> him; for he dwells <S%G3306><s%> with you, and shall be in you.
I will not leave <S%G863><s%> you comfortless: <S%G3737><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to you.

Yet <S%G2089><s%> a little <S%G3397><s%> while, and the world <S%G2889><s%> sees <S%G2334><s%> me no <S%G3765><s%> more; <S%G2089><s%> but you see <S%G2334><s%> me: because <S%G3754><s%> I live, <S%G2198><s%> you shall live <S%G2198><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
At <S%G1722><s%> that day <S%G2250><s%> you shall know <S%G1097><s%> that I am in my Father, <S%G3962><s%> and you in me, and I in you.

He that has <S%G2192><s%> my commandments, <S%G1785><s%> and keeps <S%G5083><s%> them, he it is that loves <S%G25><s%> me: and he that loves <S%G25><s%> me shall be loved <S%G25><s%> of my Father, <S%G3962><s%> and I will love <S%G25><s%> him, and will manifest <S%G1718><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> to him.

Judas <S%G2455><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, not Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> how <S%G5101><s%> is it that you will manifest <S%G1718><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> to us, and not to the world? <S%G2889><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> love <S%G25><s%> me, he will keep <S%G5083><s%> my words: <S%G3056><s%> and my Father <S%G3962><s%> will love <S%G25><s%> him, and we will come <S%G2064><s%> to him, and make <S%G4160><s%> our stayed <S%G3438><s%> with him.

He that loves <S%G25><s%> me not keeps <S%G5083><s%> not my sayings: <S%G3056><s%> and the word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you hear <S%G191><s%> is not mine, <S%G1699><s%> but the Father's <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sent <S%G3992><s%> me.
These <S%G5023><s%> things have I spoken <S%G2980><s%> to you, being yet present <S%G3306><s%> with you.

But the Comforter, <S%G3875><s%> which is the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> will send <S%G3992><s%> in my name, <S%G3686><s%> he shall teach <S%G1321><s%> you all <S%G3956><s%> things, and bring <S%G5279><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things to your <S%G5209><s%> remembrance, <S%G5279><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> I have said <S%G2036><s%> to you.

Peace <S%G1515><s%> I leave <S%G863><s%> with you, my peace <S%G1515><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> to you: not as the world <S%G2889><s%> gives, <S%G1325><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> I to you. Let not your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> be troubled, <S%G5015><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> let it be afraid. <S%G1168><s%>

You have heard <S%G191><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> to you, I go <S%G5217><s%> away, <S%G5217><s%> and come <S%G2064><s%> again to you. If <S%G1487><s%> you loved <S%G25><s%> me, you would rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I said, <S%G2036><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> to the Father: <S%G3962><s%> for my Father <S%G3962><s%> is greater <S%G3187><s%> than I.
And now <S%G3568><s%> I have told <S%G2046><s%> you before <S%G4250><s%> it come <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that, when <S%G3752><s%> it is come <S%G1096><s%> to pass, you might believe. <S%G4100><s%>

Hereafter <S%G2089><s%> I will not talk <S%G2980><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> with you: for the prince <S%G758><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> and has <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> in me.

But that the world <S%G2889><s%> may know <S%G1097><s%> that I love <S%G25><s%> the Father; <S%G3962><s%> and as the Father <S%G3962><s%> gave <S%G1781><s%> me commandment, <S%G1781><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> I do. <S%G4160><s%> Arise, <S%G1453><s%> let us go <S%G71><s%> hence. <S%G1782><s%>
